segments.text: Hello . I've been asked to come and see about something called L / C ? What is it exactly ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: L / C stands for ' letter of credit ' . This is necessary for trade between two countries . A Letter of Credit is quite literally that â€” a letter addressed by the buyer's bank to the seller's bank stating that they could vouch for their good customer , the buyer , and that they would pay the seller in case of the buyer's default . Nowadays , it's sometimes used for domestic trade too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So the other party could be across the world or just on the other side of the street !
